original_title: Valkyrie and Jack: A Love Story
overview: Diedre and Frida nervously await the premiere of their film Giantess Attack vs. Mecha-Fembot. Unfortunately, the theater comes under attack by a 100 ft tall Valkyrie and her angry husband Jack Norris. Will the women secure a deal for their film, or will their dreams go up in smoke and rubble?
title: Valkyrie and Jack: A Love Story
